price: [Issa (Yesu) yaravuze ati] “Kandi mu by’ukuri Allah ni Nyagasani wanjye akaba na Nyagasani wanyu; bityo nimumugaragire (wenyine). Iyo ni yo nzira igororotse.”
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّي وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna al-laha rabbī warabbukum fa-uʿ'budūhu hādhā ṣirāṭun mus'taqīmun
